title: Track object modifications via "this"
body:
Taken from https://github.com/rollup/rollup/issues/2306#issuecomment-406612021:

In situations where an object is modified via accessing `this` in a function, the modification is not tracked properly. Example:

https://rollupjs.org/repl?version=0.63.3&

Note that the use of `.call` or `.apply` is handled correctly:
https://rollupjs.org/repl?version=0.63.3&

The modification-tracking needs to consider how a function is called:
https://rollupjs.org/repl?version=0.63.3&

Closes #3093 
Closes #2473 
Closes #3027
